name: The Laplacian - A Platformer Game
description: In The Laplacian you simply have to reach the goal in each of the 20 levels. But this becomes more difficult from level to level and every little mistake can bring a quick end. At the beginning there are 4 training levels in which you get to know the most important elements. Every 5th level is a boss level. In the other levels there are jetpacks, alien opponents, saws, dangerous swings and much more.
